target_name: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources
computation_definitions:
Data unavailable (Type4)
There are currently no national statistics (Type 1), international statistics (Type 2), or alternative national statistics (Type 3) available. The Data of Type 1, type 2, or type 3 can be also included in case of temporary unavailability.
indicator_name: Material footprint, material footprint per capita, and material footprint per GDP
indicator_definition: Material Footprint (MF) is the attribution of global material extraction to domestic final demand of a country. The total material footprint is the sum of the material footprint for biomass, fossil fuels, metal ores and non-metal ores.
global_indicator_name: Material footprint, material footprint per capita, and material footprint per GDP
title: Untitled
